hero_title:
Hi, my name is Diogo Vidazinha
Focused on AI, while staying open to everything technology can still teach me.
about_p1: Final-year Computer Engineering student at IPBeja with a particular interest in Artificial Intelligence. I enjoy learning by doing, whether through academic projects, practical challenges or new technologies.
about_p2:
I completed a summer internship at Boliden SOMINCOR, where I gained experience in system administration, networking and software development. I also supported technological operations at more than 1,000 meters underground, a unique opportunity that gave me real insight into how IT supports safety and critical operations.

My Erasmus experience at Vilnius Tech strengthened my adaptability, communication and ability to collaborate in diverse and multicultural environments.

I also bring over 5 years of direct customer-facing experience, which helped develop empathy, confidence and clear communication.
about_p3: Outside of technology, I balance my day with sports, music, personal development reading and a strong passion for motorcycles.
skills_card1_desc: Python, Artificial Intelligence and development of academic and personal applications.
skills_card2_desc: Foundations in system administration, networking, virtualisation, backups and automation, gained during my internship at SOMINCOR.
skills_card3_desc: Communication, teamwork, adaptability, problem-solving and continuous learning.
highlights_card1_desc: Supported communication and IT systems inside an active mine during my internship at SOMINCOR.
highlights_card2_desc: International teamwork, quick adaptation and technical communication in English.
highlights_card3_desc: Customer-facing experience while studying, developing empathy, clarity and confidence in communication.
projects_subtitle: Some of my most relevant academic and personal work
projects_card1_desc: Hands-on work in system administration, cybersecurity and networking. I went down over 1,000 meters underground to support and inspect communication systems — a unique perspective on how technology supports safety and operations.
projects_card2_desc: Desktop application with authentication, full CRUD and database integration. I implemented both backend logic and the user interface using JavaFX, with a focus on clean code and consistent user experience.
projects_card3_title: Earth–Moon System — Numerical Simulation in Python
projects_card3_desc: Development of a numerical model of the three-body problem (Earth, Moon, spacecraft) using the Runge–Kutta 5(4) adaptive method via SciPy’s solve_ivp. Explored multiple initial conditions to analyse orbital sensitivity and chaotic behaviour.
contact_text: Available for internships and junior roles in Python, AI and technology. Open to new challenges, remote or on-site (Évora/Beja), motivated to learn and grow.
